entry.title: Simple Chat With A Little PusherApp
entry.content:
Goal

Make a Chat Application Where an admin user can chat to many users. The admin can also turn the chat off and on.

How

Use PusherApp presence and private channels.

``` ruby Discover if a number is prime http://www.noulakaz.net/weblog/2007/03/18/a-regular-expression-to-check-for-prime-numbers/ Source Article class Fixnum def prime?

('1' * self) !~ /^1?$|^(11+?)\1+$/

end end ```
